subject: Radio on ebay $29.99 + shipping
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Here is someone selling either an older used 12-469 (looking at the 
picture) or an older used 12-470 (using the wrong picture for the 
ad..??) based on the description.
http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=180209031614

You may want to contact the seller to make sure it is one that can be 
Radio Shack hacked before buying.

- Mike
